definitions.title: n. pr.
definitions.body: of wady just E. of Jerusalem (Thes. turbidus);—´[[נַחַל ק]]: 2Sa 15:23, 1Ki 2:37; usu. as place for refuse 1Ki 15:13 = 2Ch 15:16, 2Ki 23:6, 2Ki 23:6, 2Ki 23:12, 2Ch 29:16, 2Ch 30:14, Je 31:40; so ´[[שַׁדְמוֹת ק]]: 2Ki 23:4; Kedrwn; cf. Rob:Phys. Geogr, 87ff. Buhl:Geogr. 93 Bd:Pal. 3 (1898), 94.
